commands.description: Pong.  Sanity Check to see if the service is running.
Will start the dota match timers, with time initialized in seconds.  Defaults to 0:00 game time.
Will stop the current dota match timers and clear all time events.
Will give the game time in xx:xx format
Will manually set the game time.  Accepts time in seconds, or in time format xx:xx
Will start the rosh tracker.  Will announce aegis expiring and earliest rosh respawn time.
